heading: twin tragedies?
subheading: the egyptair 767 that crashed off the massachusetts coast early sunday rolled off the boeing assembly line shortly before the lauda air 767 that crashed into a jungle in thailand eight years ago. both planes were completed during one of the stormiest times in boeing's history. boeing assembly workers walked off the job a few days later, complaining of fatigue caused by too much overtime. a boeing spokesman said there was nothing to indicate the two crashes were related.
author: wired staff
text: the egyptair 767 that crashed off the massachusetts coast early sunday rolled off the boeing assembly line shortly before the lauda air 767 that crashed into a jungle in thailand eight years ago. both planes were completed during one of the stormiest times in boeing's history. boeing assembly workers walked off the job a few days later, complaining of fatigue caused by too much overtime. a boeing spokesman said there was nothing to indicate the two crashes were related.
